hero.title: Translate today, shake hands tomorrow
hero.subtitle: Unlock your potential and redefine your limits with us. Our translators tailor translations for your business, ensuring your voice crosses the borders.

edge.title: Discover our unique edge
edge.subtitle: It's our commitment to spread your voice. We deliver effective, efficient translations and localizations paired with professional translators to help you reach your goals.

features.title: Personalized Translations
features.description: We collaborate with a highly experienced team of professional translators to create customized translations that drive your business's growth and global engagement.

features.title: Cutting-edge Localizations
features.description: Aided by native experts in localization, we deliver cutting-edge adaptations that precisely align with your audience's language and cultural nuances.

features.title: Supportive Customer Service
features.description: We extend a supportive customer service, available at all times, to aid our clients in determining the best approach.

languages.trusted: WE ARE TRUSTED BY CONSOLIDATE INTERNATIONAL COMPANIES
languages.subtitle: GET TO KNOW OUR LANGUAGES SERVICES
languages.title: Native speakers, fluent in both source and target languages
languages.description: The translation process begins with document intake, followed by a content analysis to specify goals. We then match the best professionals to ensure the delivery of high-quality translations.

services.title: General translations
services.description: Translating is just more than transcribing the text from one language into another.

services.title: Proofreading
services.description: Proofreading is the process of interfering in the text, aiming at its improvement.

services.title: Localizations
services.description: Localizing content is the most important concept when you want to advertise your products around the World.

services.title: Sworn translations
services.description: Sworn translations are specialized translations that hold legal validity, often required in scenarios involving official documents such as contracts, academic certificates, and immigration.

services.title: Transcriptions
services.description: Transcribing or rewriting audio or video is nothing more than passing what is spoken in audio to its text version. That is, transforming a sound recording, audio into text.

services.title: Subtitling & Captioning
services.description: Subtitling & Captioning are essential components of modern media, allowing audiences to engage with content across various languages and accessibility needs.

languages.humanTouch: We prioritize human translation, ensuring a genuine touch, not automated

pricing.subtitle: SIMPLE PRICING
pricing.title: Minimal investment, Maximum results
pricing.description: At Collabtranslation, we are committed to making language services accessible. Experience exceptional translation solutions at remarkably competitive rates.

plans.name: Lite
plans.description: It involves a human translator reviewing and improving the output generated by a machine translation system. The process typically includes correcting errors, refining the language, and ensuring that the translation meets the desired level of quality and accuracy.

plans.name: Professional
plans.description: Professional human translation involves a skilled translator and revisor converting text from one language to another while maintaining the intended meaning, tone, and style. Furthermore, when necessary, the content will be also localized to meet the target audience.

plans.name: Premium
plans.description: Premium translation services employ experienced and professional translators who are experts in the subject matter of the content they are translating plus a rigorous quality assurance processes to meet high standards, involving multiple rounds of review, editing, and proofreading.

services.title: Document Translation
services.description: Certified and technical translation of official documents, contracts and certificates.

services.title: Website Localization
services.description: Web content adaptation for different languages and cultures while maintaining brand essence.

services.title: Technical Translation
services.description: Specialists in manuals, technical specifications and specialized documentation.

services.title: Proofreading and Editing
services.description: Thorough review of translated texts ensuring quality and accuracy.

services.title: Interpretation
services.description: Simultaneous and consecutive interpretation services for events and meetings.

services.title: App Localization
services.description: Translation and adaptation of mobile applications for international markets.

cta.title: Ready to kickstart a transformation with a high-quality translation service?
cta.description: There has never been a better time than now. Embark on translating your content with Collabtranslation today.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a company specialized in quality translations, with over 10 years of market experience. Our team of native translators ensures precision and naturalness in every project.

footer.description: Experts in professional translations for companies and individuals.
